trans-unit.source: Learn more about $150 monthly Azure credit
trans-unit.target: Learn more about $150 monthly Azure credit

trans-unit.source: Try running virtual machines, storing data, and developing serverless apps in the cloud with Azure. The $150 monthly Azure credit is part of the subscription to spend however a subscriber would like. There’s no credit card required.
trans-unit.target: Try running virtual machines, storing data, and developing serverless apps in the cloud with Azure. The $150 monthly Azure credit is part of the subscription to spend however a subscriber would like. There’s no credit card required.

trans-unit.source: Learn more about Azure Dev/Test Pay-As-You-Go subscription
trans-unit.target: Learn more about Azure Dev/Test Pay-As-You-Go subscription

trans-unit.source: Create Dev/Test Pay-As-You-Go subscriptions, enabling collaboration with other subscribers while providing isolation between teams & environment. Get exclusive discounted rates for dev/test and cloud use rights of subscription software on Azure.
trans-unit.target: Create Dev/Test Pay-As-You-Go subscriptions, enabling collaboration with other subscribers while providing isolation between teams & environment. Get exclusive discounted rates for dev/test and cloud use rights of subscription software on Azure.

trans-unit.source: Learn more about Basic plan + Test plans
trans-unit.target: Learn more about Basic plan + Test plans

trans-unit.source: Plan, build, and ship, any app, for any platform. You can use all the Azure DevOps services, including Azure Pipelines, Azure Boards, Azure Repos, Azure Test Plans and Azure Artifacts.
trans-unit.target: Plan, build, and ship, any app, for any platform. You can use all the Azure DevOps services, including Azure Pipelines, Azure Boards, Azure Repos, Azure Test Plans and Azure Artifacts.
